TopicTitle: Kerbal Turned to 'Debris' when knocked out of External Command Seat.

Articles.Content:
No reason to drag this out. How do I fix?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-06T23:26:15Z" title="08/06/2015 11:26  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 6, 2015</time> by Kuansenhama**

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285)

Assuming you have no issue with a bugfix mod.

You can also try this, if you don't want to install add-ons. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75586-Master-Thread-Unresponsive-Kerbals-in-EVA](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75586-Master-Thread-Unresponsive-Kerbals-in-EVA)

(Moved to support.)

Cheers,

~Claw
